import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.scss'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'rock-paper-scissors'; isOptionSelected = false; optionSelected = ''; matchFinished = false; constructor() {} public selectedOption(option:string){ console.log(option); this.isOptionSelected = true; this.optionSelected = option; } }
